attributes.title: The Wildest Board Game Win Yet - Night Of The Ninja
attributes.caption: This week on Let’s Roll Shurikens fly and houses fall, as we play Night of The Ninja. Geoff, Matt, Lindsay, Michael, Joe, and Alfredo battle it out see who will be crowned top ninja.

attributes.title: Doctor Strange In The Let's Roll Of Madness
attributes.caption: In Achievement Hunters' "Doctor Strange In The Let's Roll Of Madness", the cast unlocks the multiverse inviting in a dangerous foe from the east coast.
attributes.description: In Achievement Hunters' "Doctor Strange In The Let's Roll Of Madness", the cast unlocks the multiverse inviting in a dangerous foe from the east coast.  Journey into the unknown with Alfredo as Doctor Strange, Matt as Wolverine, Ky as Scarlet Witch, and Michael as Thor, Larry as Old Captain America, and Jeremy as the dangerous Magneto.  Worlds will collide on the table top as Doctor Strange and allies face their toughest roll yet.
attributes.display_title: Doctor Strange In The Let's Roll Of Madness

attributes.title: Cryptid Hunting Boardgame - Horrified: American Monsters
attributes.caption: This week on Let's Roll, three Cryptids were sighted in the small town of Cross Creek, and the Red Web Duo Trevor and Alfredo employed their friends Michael and Matt to Investigate and capture them.
attributes.description: This week on Let's Roll, three Cryptids were sighted in the small town of Cross Creek, and the Red Web Duo Trevor and Alfredo employed their friends Michael and Matt to Investigate and capture them. This, is the recreation of that night. (Part 1 of 2)
attributes.display_title: Cryptid Hunting Boardgame - Horrified: American Monsters

attributes.title: Hunting MORE Cryptids! - Horrified: American Monsters | (Part 2)
attributes.caption: Continuing from last week’s Let’s Roll, our investigators successfully eliminated the Mothman. But now Trevor, Alfredo, Michael, and Matt still have Bigfoot and Chupacabra to go.
attributes.description: Continuing from last week’s Let’s Roll, our investigators successfully eliminated the Mothman. But now Trevor, Alfredo, Michael, and Matt still have Bigfoot and Chupacabra to go. Can they get it done? Will they save Cross Creek? Can they save they goats? Goodness gracious, I hope so. (Part 2 of 2)
attributes.display_title: Hunting MORE Cryptids! - Horrified: American Monsters | (Part 2)

attributes.title: Colt Express | We Rob a Train!
attributes.caption: Yeehaw! It's time for a Cowboy Caper! This week on Let's Roll, we play Colt Express. A competitive board game that's all about who can steal the most money from a train. Join BK, Jack, Matt, and Trevor to see who's the most ruthless outlaw this side of the tracks!
attributes.description: Yeehaw! It's time for a Cowboy Caper! This week on Let's Roll, we play Colt Express. A competitive board game that's all about who can steal the most money from a train. Join BK, Jack, Matt, and Trevor to see who's the most ruthless outlaw this side of the tracks!

attributes.title: Survive: Escape from Atlantis | Swimming From Sharks!
attributes.caption: This week Let's Roll swims into the deep end forcing BK, Larry, Matt, and Trevor to try and escape the creatures of the sea in ""Survive: Escape from Atlantis""!

attributes.title: Wavelength | Can They Read Their Teammate's Mind?
attributes.caption: This week for Let's Roll we're playing Wavelength! Michael, Lindsay, and Alfredo are up against Jack, BK, and Joe in trying to successfully predict what their teammates are thinking to score the most points.
attributes.description: Bonus Rounds start at 43:15 | This week for Let's Roll we're playing Wavelength! Michael, Lindsay, and Alfredo are up against Jack, BK, and Joe in trying to successfully predict what their teammates are thinking to score the most points. Will they be able to guess on the scale where their teammate thinks "baked potato chips" are healthy or unhealthy AND where "World War 3" is historically important or unimportant?
attributes.display_title: Wavelength | Can They Read Their Teammate's Mind?

attributes.caption: In this week's Let's Roll, we are playing "Kill Dr. Lucky" the spiritual precursor to Clue! Join Joe, BK, Jack, Matt, Geoff, and Michael as they hunt down the unsuspecting Doctor and try to kill him before anyone else can!

attributes.caption: This week on Let’s Roll we’re playing Quest, a social deduction game where the goal is to find the saboteurs and root out evil. Can the team figure out who’s evil in time, or will they just end up sabotaging themselves?

attributes.caption: In this 2-part Season Finale of Let's Roll, we try to escape an old Arctic Research base that has been overtaken by the alien iconic itself, The Thing. With special guests Barbara Dunkelman, Meg Turney, and Jackie Butler!

attributes.caption: In Part 2 of the Season Finale of Let's Roll, decisions have to be made. Who is a human, and who is left behind? With special guests Barbara Dunkelman, Meg Turney, and Jackie Butler!

attributes.title: 4 Idiots Are Trapped in A Hell Tunnel | The Night Cage
attributes.caption: Let's Roll returns during the scariest month of the year with the cooperative horror game "The Night Cage." In it, we must work together to escape an ever-changing maze while being hunted by monsters. But can we do it before our candle goes out?

attributes.title: Monikers with Funhaus: It Gets WEIRD
attributes.caption: This week on Let's Roll we are playing Monikers with Funhaus.  This game has us testing our word play and charade skills to earn the most points before the cards are all gone!

attributes.title: A Bidding Game with INFINITE Money! | Let's Roll: Q.E.
attributes.caption: This week on Let's Roll we are playing Quantitative Easing.  In this game: Joe, Alfredo, BK, Jack, and Trevor are all bidders attempting to bail out industries that are "Too big to fail".  Players who collect the most points from each industry they acquire win, but if they spent more than the competition overall, they lose!
attributes.description: This week on Let's Roll we are playing Quantitative Easing.  In this game: Joe, Alfredo, BK, Jack, and Trevor are all bidders attempting to bail out industries that are "Too big to fail".  Players who collect the most points from each industry they acquire win, but if they spent more than the competition overall, they lose!

attributes.title: Pizza For Thanksgiving?! - New York Slice - Let’s Roll
attributes.caption: Michael, Lindsay, Alfredo, and Joe have their Thanksgiving dinner in New York Slice.
attributes.description: This week on Let’s Roll we celebrate what we’re all truly thankful for… Pizza! Michael, Lindsay, Alfredo, and Joe have their Thanksgiving dinner in New York Slice. Can this dysfunctional family make it through a holiday episode without it ending in a fight? Probably not, but let’s find out!
attributes.display_title: Pizza For Thanksgiving?! - New York Slice - Let’s Roll

attributes.title: 1989's BEST Board Game! - Mall Madness
attributes.caption: This week on Let’s Roll the mall is BACK! Michael, Jack, Lindsay, and Joe try to get their Black Friday shopping done and out of the mall first, in the 1989 version of Mall Madness.
attributes.description: This week on Let’s Roll the mall is BACK! Michael, Jack, Lindsay, and Joe try to get their Black Friday shopping done and out of the mall first, in the 1989 version of Mall Madness. Can these shoppers stay sane long enough to get the best deals, or will the man in the mall keep all the goods for himself. The rest of this description costs FiVe DoLlArS MoRe.
attributes.display_title: 1989's BEST Board Game! - Mall Madness

attributes.title: Kitchen Mayhem with Face Jam! - Kitchen Rush
attributes.caption: This week on Let's Roll we've got a Face Jam crossover! We're playing Kitchen Rush where Michael, Eric, Joe, and Jack are working together to cook meals for their customers in a high-pressure kitchen, all in real-time. The stakes (ha) are high, cooperation is a must, and time management is crucial.
attributes.description: This week on Let's Roll we've got a Face Jam crossover! We're playing Kitchen Rush where Michael, Eric, Joe, and Jack are working together to cook meals for their customers in a high-pressure kitchen, all in real-time. The stakes (ha) are high, cooperation is a must, and time management is crucial. Will they run a successful kitchen and get their meals out? Let's watch and find out, chefs.
attributes.display_title: Kitchen Mayhem with Face Jam! - Kitchen Rush

attributes.title: Why is this Child's Game so Hype?! - Ice Cool
attributes.caption: This Week on Let's Roll we channel our inner Benedict Cucumberpatch and become pengwings, penglings? Penguins! We become Penguins in Ice Cool, the board game of tubular High school Penguins sliding and stunting through their ice-covered High school as the hall monitor is a TOTAL buzzkill and tries to steal their hall pass.

attributes.title: POV: Every Time You Play a Boardgame with Your Family for the Holidays | Deck the Halls
attributes.caption: This week on Let's Roll, we're preparing for the Holidays by playing Deck the Halls! A cooperative game where each player is a member of a family, and must finish decorating the house before Christmas.
attributes.description: This week on Let's Roll, we're preparing for the Holidays by playing Deck the Halls! A cooperative game where each player is a member of a family, and must finish decorating the house before Christmas.
attributes.display_title: POV: Every Time You Play a Boardgame with Your Family for the Holidays | Deck the Halls

attributes.title: We Play The Godfather | Mafia De Cuba | Let's Roll with BlizzBear
attributes.caption:
This week on Let's Roll there has been a heist!  In Mafia De Cuba players will attempt to steal diamonds from the Godmother and try not to get caught.  Who will get caught and who will get away with the prized jewels?  |  Roles:  Godfather: Starts the game with the box.  Attempt to find thieves.  If the Godfather recovers all 15 Diamonds, they win.
Henchman: Take henchman chip from the box.  Team up with the godfather.  Wins if the godfather wins.  Thief: Steal any diamonds from the box.  If godfather is eliminated, thief with most diamonds wins.  Agent: Attempts to fool the godfather.  If the godfather chooses agent to empty their pockets, the agent wins.  Driver: If the player to the right of the driver wins, they win.  Street Urchin: Become this role if the box is empty or you take nothing as last player.  If any thief wins, the street urchin wins.  Cleaner:  Can shoot a player before they empty their pockets.  If the cleaner kills the agent, they win.
attributes.description:
This week on Let's Roll there has been a heist!  In Mafia De Cuba players will attempt to steal diamonds from the Godmother and try not to get caught.  Who will get caught and who will get away with the prized jewels?  |  Roles:  Godfather: Starts the game with the box.  Attempt to find thieves.  If the Godfather recovers all 15 Diamonds, they win.
Henchman: Take henchman chip from the box.  Team up with the godfather.  Wins if the godfather wins.  Thief: Steal any diamonds from the box.  If godfather is eliminated, thief with most diamonds wins.  Agent: Attempts to fool the godfather.  If the godfather chooses agent to empty their pockets, the agent wins.  Driver: If the player to the right of the driver wins, they win.  Street Urchin: Become this role if the box is empty or you take nothing as last player.  If any thief wins, the street urchin wins.  Cleaner:  Can shoot a player before they empty their pockets.  If the cleaner kills the agent, they win.
attributes.display_title: We Play The Godfather | Mafia De Cuba | Let's Roll with BlizzBear
